title: Lokal Burger and Beer
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The veggie burger, black bean burger, heirloom tomato salad, and lokal salad can be modified for vegans - ask. The veggie tacos has veggie patty sliced and topped with dry slaw, roasted peppers, avocado, red onions, cilantro. Sustainably designed with up-cycled furniture and runs on 100% wind and solar energy power. Dog-friendly.
